revised_title: Fossil Remains of an Animal Resembling Ornithorhynchus paradoxus
tldr: The author, Everard Home, examines the fossil remains of an animal and discovers similarities between its bones and those of the Ornithorhynchus paradoxus. This connection between extinct and living animals is of great interest to comparative anatomists and geologists. The fossil animal is found to have lived in water, similar to the Ornithorhynchus, but with differences in its mode of progressive motion.
